drafts.text:
We're past the 'AI is coming' phase.

We're now in the 'AI is choosing who thrives' phase.

The gap isn't between those who use AI and those who don't.

It's between those who use it to think deeper vs. those who use it to think less.

Your job won't be replaced by AI.

Your job will be replaced by someone using AI to do 10x what you do.

The competitive advantage isn't the toolâ€”it's the speed of iteration it unlocks.

Every company is now an AI company.

They just don't know it yet.

The ones that figure this out in 2025 will lap the competition by 2027.

The best AI prompt engineers aren't the ones with the fanciest templates.

They're the ones who understand the problem they're solving better than anyone else.
